## AudioManager.setStreamVolume() method

设置音量大小

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static setStreamVolume( audioStream : AudioStream, volume : number) : void ;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  audioStream | [AudioStream](./extractor.audiostream.md) | 声音类型,(暂时只接收XR\_AUDIO\_STREAM\_MUSIC类型,设置其他类型时无效) |
|  volume | number | 音量大小 |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
